titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to W. T. Scott
CWG13689

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Folder Military Request and Authorization (Form 12) 1861-1861 (1)

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To W. T. Scott Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered as Pay Master of State Troops from April 1. 1864 to Nov 1 1864 Seven months at $200. per month

body.p: The Quarter Master General will pay the above account from the military Fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 15 of Nov, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Fourteen hundred Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No 22.
No. 120 Abstract B No 2 Qr. 186.
W T Scott
Dollars 1400 00/100
Paid Nov 15, 1864.
State Guard
certif no
